## Source: ossf-package-analysis (643959f3bad134aeb7e2e5ea40f5f4c01cb16fc0ef02238b81d5f5ee1ef42970)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'run-scenarios-helpers' @ 99.0.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
